attributes.action: Introduce legislation to eliminate plastic packaging in supermarkets
attributes.additional_details: UK supermarkets currently generate 900,000 tonnes of plastic packaging each year. Some supermarkets have trialled and announced plastic reduction measures, but we need industry-wide action across the UK. By ditching plastic packaging, supermarkets have the power to lead the way in dramatically reducing the amount of single-use plastic produced.
attributes.background: The UK Government must introduce legislation making plastic free transition plans mandatory for UK supermarkets.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about plastic packaging, however we're not sure what specific action you want the Government to take to "eliminate" it.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a related action:  

Ban All Single Use Plastics and Plastic Packaging to Save Our Planet: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607466
